descriptionNullable:
Where do people in the US work? What has changed over the last 20 years regarding employment in the US.

This data set comes from the Bureau of Economic Analysis (https://bea.gov). It has employment data by US state for time period of 2001-2019.

It breaks down Total Full Time and Part Time Employment by NAICS (North American Industry Classification System) Industry.

Here's a notebook that explains the basic of BEA data files and graphs a specific state/industry -> https://www.kaggle.com/davidbroberts/us-employment-by-industry-2001-2019

Thanks to https://unsplash.com/@emmages for the splash image
title: US Employment By Industry - 2001-2019
subtitle: Sorry I'm late boss ..
